title: Plan a Broker Tour
description: To generate buzz for a new luxury listing, an agent wants to host a 'broker's open' or tour for other agents.

tasks.description: Set a date and time for the tour (typically a weekday morning).
tasks.expected_outcome: The tour is scheduled for Tuesday from 10 AM to 1 PM.

tasks.description: Announce the broker tour in the MLS and send an e-flyer to a list of local real estate agents.
tasks.expected_outcome: The event is published on the MLS, and an email invitation is sent to a list of 500+ local agents.

tasks.description: Arrange for catering (e.g., coffee and pastries) for the event.
tasks.expected_outcome: An order is placed with a local caterer for the event.
